name: Gravity Box (DaMastah)
description:
Gravity Box is a minimalistic sandbox game where gravity is your friend. Create your planets and let the mystical force take over. Try building a whole solar system or just watch how the planets behave in different scenarios. Can you replicate our solar system? Time to find out!

Features

  •  Create systems of planets and watch how they behave
  • Edit your planets
  • Change the speed of the simulation
  • Load pre-existing scenarios to get some inspiration about what's possible in the game
  • Save the systems you are the most proud of. Maybe even send them to a friend?
  • Temporarily pause the game to create planets with more precision. While paused, planets' sizes will be set with the scrollwheel.

NOTE:

Savefiles will be located under: C:\Users\username\AppData\LocalLow\DaMastah\GravityBox\saves

Updates

  • Planets now grow marginally faster than before
  • The volume of the music has been lowered from the start
  • You can now run the game in the background
